Description: Here is a very well taken care of ESP George Lynch Signature. Belt marks on the back (not noticeable in pics) and several scratches on the back as well. Front of the body looks perfect. Minimum wear on frets and no marks on the headstock front. 2 small dings on the back. Let me know if you have any questions. Can ship once a week. Will ship with hard case and case candy. Neck pickup has been modded to sustainer, thus 2 knobs and 2 switches have been added A distinctive George Lynch Signature model, built in the famous ESP Custom Shop in Japan, an instrument of highest quality, with absolutely professional features. Finish: Black, with Custom "Skulls & Snakes" graphics. With black hardware. Body: Alder. Neck: Maple. Bolt-on neck construction - this enables a fast, precise attack, along with a full, "fat" tone. Scale: 25.5" - Standard. Fretboard: Rosewood, with custom inlays. Frets: 22, XJ (Jumbo) - with a perfect fretjob, another famous feature of ESP instruments. Nut: 43 mm, FR locking, 45 mm neck width. Headstock: ESP M Style, black, reversed. Tuners: Original Gotoh. Bridge: Original Floyd Rose tremolo. Pickups: 1x Seymour Duncan Screamin' Demon (bridge), 1x SUSTAINER
Title: ESP George Lynch Skulls & Snakes Custom Shop Black
